basic.description:
Similarities and differences in the myths of ancient Egypt and Mesopotamia will be explored on the basis of material remains (e.g., the pyramids and temple architecture) and texts.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Mythology of the Ancient Near East

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  Level 2 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS
